column4: Hey guys, I need help setting up my bluetooth headset with Ubuntu 8.10. Can someone guide me?
does bluetooth work there?
where?
the bleutooth "thing" on the pc or laptop
does the pc find the hearset?
well, it connects under vista, it was finding the headset in ubuntu before
is it a laptop? kill network manager
then i tried following this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BluetoothAudio for the sco, now it doesnt detect it
yes it is a laptop
then stop and remove network manager piece of junk software and bluetooth will work again. in its position install wicd. tell me if you need help
i do need help
but as of right now, it is not detecting bluetooth, it was before i followed this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BluetoothAudio
its because of the network manager getting involved, trust me. too bad i dont have a log of a convo with another guy about the same subject to show you
well, i dont mind trying your suggestion, I just don't know the proper way of going about it.
are you on wireless now?
network manager has my auto eth0 and wlan0 both connected
...and bluetooth "stuck" too
what do you mean by "stuck"?
not working
its not doing what i want it to do...so yes?
yes!
so, can you guide me on how to fix it?
can i pm you?
please do
